title: ettanaiyO mahAngaL
sahitya:
ettanaiyO mahAngaL iraivan aruLAlE iniya vazhi kATTinAr anaivarkkum vandanam


anupallavi

  shuddha sutantara siddha puruSargaL sOrum pOdellAm vEril nIr vArttanar


caraNam    ellA gurumArkkum idayam kalanda nanri evarevaraip-pArttAlum iraivan vaDivamenrE
nallAraip-pOTri nalam sheidavaruLLE vallAn shuddha shakti nAthanai vaNanguvEn
